meanings.sent1: The firecracker was disploding loudly in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The volcano erupted, disploding hot lava everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The balloon was disploding with confetti, creating a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like a bomb disploding in the room, causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks disploding in the night sky painted a beautiful picture.

meanings.definition: The act of bursting or exploding suddenly.
meanings.sent1: The disploding of the balloon startled everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The disploding of the bomb was heard miles away.
meanings.sent3: The sudden disploding of the popcorn bag made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: The disploding of emotions in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The disploding of colors in the painting caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Causing something to burst or explode.
meanings.sent1: The disploding sound of the firework display was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The disploding force of the impact shattered the glass.
meanings.sent3: The disploding laughter of the children filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: The disploding energy of the performance left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The disploding flavors of the dish delighted the taste buds.
